info.title: Ent Schema API
info.description: This is an auto generated API description made out of an Ent schema definition

parameters.name: itemsPerPage
parameters.description: item count to render per page

post.description: Creates a new Entitlement and persists it to storage.

get.description: Finds the Entitlement with the requested ID and returns it.

200.description: Entitlement with requested ID was found

delete.description: Deletes the Entitlement with the requested ID.

204.description: Entitlement with requested ID was deleted

patch.description: Updates a Entitlement and persists changes to storage.
